subject: Frauds and Swindling
Suits and Litigation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andrew Friedman, a partner at the family-run business behind the Mets, said he and the team’s owners learned of multiple investigations of Bernard Madoff by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
snippet: Andrew Friedman, a partner at the family-run business behind the Mets, said he and the team’s owners learned of multiple investigations of Bernard Madoff by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
